title: Quest Items
content: starless night, Night Walkers are made for secrecy. Created in the honour of Shar, they allow the wearer to move quickly and unobtrusively without emanating any sort of magical aura.This particular pair belonged to an overly confident Dark Justiciar, who perished long ago while raiding the village of Moonhaven. Though the boots are slowly falling apart, a trace of their original enchantment remains. The Wearer of this Item gains: Misty Step: Level 2 Conjuration Spell Night Walker Idol of Silvanu
